POINTS
For every word that was guessed correctly you get one point, the goal is to demonstrate your teammates displayed words and them to guess as soon as possible, because each 20 seconds remaining means 1 point more.
 
TIME
When all 5 words are guessed correctly timing stops, by pressing the button "NEXT", bonus points for the remaining time are being added to the total score.

WINNER
The winner is the one who gets to the selected result first, considering that team 1 always starts first, so team 2 always has a chance for catching up "eg. the selected result is 10, team 1 gets right at the beginning a maximum of 13 points, so of course team 2 will get the chance to catch up", and if the results are equal there will be "extra - time", ie. "golden goal", who scores more points over the last round, wins.
